com.revolsys.io

Interface EndianInput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EndianInputOutput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EndianInputStream, EndianMappedByteBuffer, LittleEndianRandomAccessFile

    public interface EndianInput
extends Closeable
